name: Don't Pick Flowers
description:
"Have fun playing outside Sweetie! Don't pick the flowers. And don't jump in puddles, that's a new dress."

This is a game I made because I wanted to make a Puzzlescript game. The puzzles are kind of secondary, but get a little difficult near the end.

If you're wondering what this is all about, I've been thinking a lot about alternate timelines, growing up, life purpose and lockpicking lately, and I kind of let all of those things influence the story and puzzles.
